titleStmt.title: Votes of the Honourable, the Commons of England, assembled in the late Parliament at Westminster, in favour of Protestant dissenters.
Proceedings. 1680.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Smith at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhill, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
